title: New Jinx and Poppy skins
body: so there has been  a leak that im not sure is real or not but there is a leak for popstar poppy which is exciting and i wanted to post an idea for  a skin for jinx {{champion:78}} {{champion:222}}

replies.body:
We haven't seen anything for a Popstar Poppy to be honest with you! You can usually see what's in the works if you check [Surrender](http://www.surrenderat20.net/). 

If you're wanting to post your ideas on Skins and Champs you can bring them on over to the concepts and creations board. https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts
